alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 26 at 3:18PM MDT until June 26 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Dawson County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern Prairie County in northeastern Montana... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 318 PM MDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Interstate 94 at mile marker 181 and 182. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Terry, Fallon, Calypso, Zero and Marsh. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
